name: Kindergarten Remake but "abandoned"?
description: Welcome to kindergarten where no one batters an eyelash if you get injured. This is an abandoned sequel of kindergarten and is very short. The only person to talk to is nugget and the school has run down. Press arrow keys to move around your character Billy The Bean. Game Tip: When you touch a object where you talk you have to move away from it for it to work. NUGGET IS EVERYWHERE! (Only In The Background)
